name: chunkiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being large, thick, or heavy, or in large pieces: The chunkiness of the knitwear disguises our own physical chunkiness. Crushed tomatoes will give you a smooth, thick sauce, while chopped ones add a nice chunkiness.
More examplesFewer examplesThe chunkiness of the sauce depends on the kind of marmalade you used.The chunkiness of these bracelets means they look better with a cocktail dress than something more dainty would.The chocolate isn't amazing, but I like the chunkiness of the walnuts.
